Homestead.WRGP:
WRGP - FIU Student Radio is the student-run radio station of Florida International University in Miami, FL. WRGP broadcasts on 88.1 MHz from a transmitter site in rural Miami-Dade County at 17107 SW 248 St and rebroadcasts in the Miami metropolitan area on translator stations W237CP, 95.3 MHz in Miami and W245BF, 96.9 MHz in North Miami. WRGP maintains its studios and offices in the Graham Center building at the FIU University Park Campus in Miami.


== History ==
FIU - Student Radio was established in 1988 as a carrier current station on 540 KHz with the call sign WUFI and a strong focus on Alternative rock.
